entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets or snow late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
